title: Believe Machine
description:
After having his heart broken by his girlfriend Yoneda Masaru happens across an android with no memories, takes her in, and names her Yuu. Eager to please her new master, she cooks, she cleans, and slowly heals his heart.

Does Yuu achieve her goal and stay with "Master" forever and become the happiest robot in the world?

Link:
[url=https://www.doujinshi.org/book/588865/Junjou-Aigan-Kanojo/]The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon[/url]
